_source.short_desc: SharpSpring offers powerful, flexible marketing automation with fully integrated CRM and social media management for agencies and SMBs.
_source.long_desc: SharpSpring, a Constant Contact company, is a revenue growth marketing platform that helps small businesses generate leads, improve conversions to sales, and drive higher returns on marketing investment. Our innovative platform, open architecture and free customer support, along with flexible contracts, drive real results for a growing business or digital marketing agency. Learn more at sharpspring.com.
_source.pricing_details: SharpSpring's pricing starts at $399/month. Please contact SharpSpring directly for further pricing information.
_source.target_audience: SharpSpring offers powerful and affordable marketing and sales automation for marketing agencies and SMBs at a fraction of the cost of the competition.

media.caption: Make key decisions with accurate and relevant data. Slice and dice powerful metrics into customized reports. Understand end-to-end ROI.
Gather all of the important data on prospects in one place, including contact information, site visits, list memberships, social notes, email interactions and lead score.

SharpSpring goes beyond the capability of traditional ESPs by providing information on visitors? activity after they click through from emails. Know every page visit, form fill-out, webinar sign-up, and white-paper download from email campaigns you send.
Create striking emails in real-time with the ?what you see is what you get? editor in SharpSpring. Continually preview the finished design with an intuitive split-screen view.

Sales Dialer is an integrated outbound calling solution for high-impact sales teams. Empower your team to optimize the quality and quantity of conversations with prospects with one-click calling, automated recording, and searchable transcription features.

category_features.name: AB Testing
category_features.definition: Create two versions of emails, forms, or actions and gauge which is more effective

category_features.name: Customizable CTAs
category_features.definition: Create unique call-to-actions to drive clicks (buttons, banners, graphics, etc.)

category_features.name: Drip Campaigns
category_features.definition: Create a path to complete a specific goal and guide leads based on the time between actions

category_features.name: Dynamic Content
category_features.definition: Create marketing content that changes based on the viewer

category_features.name: Landing Pages/Web Forms
category_features.definition: Create an online form to capture new lead information

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: ROI Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor conversion rates and analyze effectiveness and profitability of marketing efforts

category_features.name: Sales Analytics
category_features.definition: Track in detail how users interact with your campaigns and pages (scrolling, button interactions, etc.)

category_features.name: Search Marketing
category_features.definition: Track visibility and traffic from search engines

category_features.name: Segmentation
category_features.definition: Group leads or contacts based on their specific characteristics

category_features.name: Social Marketing
category_features.definition: Manage campaigns and track engagement for marketing efforts across social media channels

category_features.name: Website Visitor Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor activity of individuals who visit your website using cookies

category_features.name: Behavior Analytics
category_features.definition: Track and analyze user behavior within a system or network

category_features.name: Dynamic Content
category_features.definition: Create marketing content that changes based on the viewer

category_features.name: Landing Pages/Web Forms
category_features.definition: Create an online form to capture new lead information

category_features.definition: Engage with a lead throughout the sales process by actively providing information

category_features.definition: Manage contacts across multiple mailing lists

category_features.definition: Coordinate marketing efforts across channels (email, landing pages, social media, etc.)

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM empowers organizations with a complete customer relationship lifecycle management solution.
related_products.features: Zoho CRM can support your marketing teams to efficiently run campaigns and pass on quality leads. Get the best ROI from every campaign you create. Generate new leads, execute targeted email marketing campaigns, and compare ad spending to sales revenue with the Google Ads integration.

related_products.short_desc: HubSpot Marketing Hub helps businesses generate leads and create better customer experiences.
related_products.features: HubSpot offers a powerful suite of tools that help you turn visitors into leads. You'll get lead flows, forms, kickback emails, analytics, and more -- all designed to make it easy for you to efficiently grow your business. Capture leads, learn who they are and what they're interested in, and optimize your marketing based on data, not guesswork. Sign up for free, get started in minutes, and start growing your business today with HubSpot Marketing Hub.

related_products.short_desc: Semrush is a leading online visibility management software-as-a-service platform.
related_products.features:
With over 55 products, tools and add-ons across online visibility management, including tools for search, content, social media and market research, data for more than 142 countries, seamless integration with Google and task management platforms, Semrush is a critical solution for all companies who are serious about online presence.
Semrush in numbers: over 800 million unique domains monitored for 142 geo databases; over 43 trillion backlinks; 21 billion keywords; over 10 million users.

related_products.short_desc: 130k+ customers use ActiveCampaign to automate their marketing, from lead generation to contact management to email personalization.
related_products.features: ActiveCampaign is an intuitive, powerful marketing automation tool that's great for businesses of any size. Set up a welcome series, segment your contacts, personalize your messaging, and automate marketing workflows no one has the time for. 500+ pre-built automations, a full email template library, and effective contact management.  ActiveCampaign helps businesses make meaningful connections across social, email, messaging, chat, and text. 300+ integrations. Pricing starts at just $15/month.

related_products.short_desc: Get all the tools you will need to build better customer relationships online under one roof.
related_products.features:
Sendinblue is the best all-in-one tool for Small Businesses : Marketing Automation, Email Campaigns, Transactional Emails and SMS. You can easily increase your sales and nurture your contacts using target workflows and our scoring feature. 

It only takes 5 min to implement your Welcome Email or Abandoned Cart Workflows. We offer many plugins such as Wordpress, Magento, Salesforce and Woocommerce.

related_products.short_desc:
More Growth, Less Busy Work
Our marketing automation removes the headaches and busy work while accelerating growth.
related_products.features:
The smarter way for small businesses to do great work
Keap organizes your client information & daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks.

related_products.short_desc: #1 Marketing Platform For SMB's! Create a Free Account
related_products.features: Get everything you need to manage and grow your business,  all from a singular platform  create your free account today to explore the platform and compare plans and pricing.

related_products.short_desc: Intercom is a Customer Communications Platform that offers an unparalleled user experience, engaging customers across their lifecycle.
related_products.features: Intercom is the Engagement OS, an open channel between customer and business that is in the product, in the moment, and on their terms. We break down silos, unifying data and systems to create an ongoing dialogue, so companies can make the most of every opportunity.

related_products.short_desc: Act! Marketing Automation optimizes all the ways you communicate with prospects & customers to maximize engagement and drive business.
related_products.features: Act! Marketing Automation makes it simple to optimize all the ways you communicate with prospects and customers to maximize engagement and drive business growth.

similar_products.short_desc: Customer engagement platform for sending automated emails, push notifications, texts, and more to engage and retain your audience.
similar_products.features: Customer.io is the customer engagement platform that enables marketers to build their most sophisticated automated messaging campaigns. With access to your real-time behavioral data, create personalized and relevant messages that engage and retain your customers. Send email, push notifications, text messages, and more all through an intuitive and powerful visual building experience. Built for scale, Customer.io is used by over 4,100 companies, sending over 8 billion messages per year.

similar_products.short_desc: Pardot's lead management features CRM integration, email marketing, lead nurturing, lead scoring, and ROI reporting.
similar_products.features: Pardot empowers marketing and sales teams to work together to engage buyers, close deals, and grow relationships. Pardot's lead management features CRM integration, email marketing, lead nurturing, lead scoring, and ROI reporting to help marketing and sales teams work together to generate and qualify sales leads, shorten sales cycles, and track marketing ROI. Users can track all prospects on a site, qualify sales leads, and utilize social selling.

similar_products.short_desc: Intercom is a Customer Communications Platform that offers an unparalleled user experience, engaging customers across their lifecycle.
similar_products.features: Intercom is the Engagement OS, an open channel between customer and business that is in the product, in the moment, and on their terms. We break down silos, unifying data and systems to create an ongoing dialogue, so companies can make the most of every opportunity.

similar_products.short_desc: Klaviyo is a unified customer platform for email, SMS, and more that gives you direct ownership of your customer data and interactions.
similar_products.features: Klaviyo is a unified customer platform that gives your online brand direct ownership of your consumer data and interactions, empowering you to turn transactions with customers into productive long-term relationships-at scale. Because the Klaviyo database integrates seamlessly with your tech stack, you can get the full story on every customer that visits, and then-from the same platform-use those insights to automate personalized email and SMS communications that make people feel seen.

similar_products.short_desc: The emfluence Marketing Platform is so intuitive, you'll swear it was built just for you. Great support & flexibility, built by users.
similar_products.features: With support request times that are 5x faster than industry average and the ability to build new features and functionality to meet the needs of our marketers, we're one of the only marketing automation platforms that can truly say we're building this software for you. Featuring automated, transactional, and manual emails, landing pages, surveys, social posting, website tracking, image libraries, and more for B2B, B2C or agency programs.

similar_products.short_desc: Act! Marketing Automation optimizes all the ways you communicate with prospects & customers to maximize engagement and drive business.
similar_products.features: Act! Marketing Automation makes it simple to optimize all the ways you communicate with prospects and customers to maximize engagement and drive business growth.

similar_products.short_desc: Multichannel (Email, SMS) marketing automation platform - Easy to use, with the best deliverability
similar_products.features:
Designed for Media, Publishing and Ecommerce companies, Maropost is a premium marketing automation platform that allows you to acquire, engage and convert prospects and customers across multiple marketing channels (e.g., Emails, SMS).

We ensure the best deliverability rates in the market (98%) with a dedicated team to take care of your email marketing needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful, easy to use marketing automation software that helps generate qualified leads and translate marketing spending into revenue.
similar_products.features: Adobe Marketo Engage uses data and AI to automate marketing tasks and workflows, while tracking impact and reach. AI-assisted automations help you create in-depth profiles, and find and segment new prospects and audiences. Real-time "listening" triggers relevant content across web, mobile, and email marketing, as well as paid and social channels. Native integrations connect marketing automation with your most important tools, such as your CRM, to let your teams sync marketing and sales efforts.

similar_products.short_desc: Unboxing Marketing Automation will significantly increase customer retention and revenue.
similar_products.features: Unboxing Marketing Automation will significantly increase customer retention and revenue. The perfect marketing message and CTA for every e-commerce customer will be automatically dropped inside their package from your fulfillment center.

similar_products.short_desc: Full-stack Marketing Automation Software. Built for Marketers. Designed for Humans.
similar_products.features:
Freshmarketer is a full-fledged marketing automation solution for fast-paced marketing teams. It lets you intelligently engage your users across their lifecycle from pre to post-acquisition.

Marketers use Freshmarketer to run lifecycle campaigns, build nurturing workflows, analyze their user behavior, do personalization at scale, and more. 		

Newly Launched: Freshmarketer for Shopify
Grow your Shopify storefront with multichannel engagement and conversational marketing

similar_products.short_desc: HubSpot Marketing Hub helps businesses generate leads and create better customer experiences.
similar_products.features: HubSpot offers a powerful suite of tools that help you turn visitors into leads. You'll get lead flows, forms, kickback emails, analytics, and more -- all designed to make it easy for you to efficiently grow your business. Capture leads, learn who they are and what they're interested in, and optimize your marketing based on data, not guesswork. Sign up for free, get started in minutes, and start growing your business today with HubSpot Marketing Hub.

similar_products.short_desc: Iterable is the marketing automation platform that powers true omni-channel relevance at scale for growth marketers.
similar_products.features: Iterable is a growth marketing platform that allows you to send personalized messages at scale across channels. Create seamless, automated marketing campaigns and segments without relying on your technical teams. Iterable does the heavy lifting and allows you to dynamically create automated workflows via Workflow Studio.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Account Based Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Account Based Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Account Based Marketing software promotes revenue growth by helping businesses focus its marketing efforts on the key target audience. This software can track and encourage buying intent by delivering personalized marketing content to prospective customers at the time when they are most likely to convert.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top All-in-One Marketing Platforms on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of All-in-One Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: All-in-One Marketing Platforms provide multiple digital marketing tools for SMBs as part of one comprehensive package. Products offer marketing automation, campaign management, email and social marketing, lead management, landing pages/web forms, dynamic content, and various other marketing features.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Brand Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Brand Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Brand Management software includes a variety of tools for creating, compiling, updating and storing product information. Among many functions of such software are ad building, requirements management, product material distribution and communications management. For related software see: Marketing Automation software and Digital Asset Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Campaign Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Campaign Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Campaign Management software enables organizations to automate the tracking, delivery, reporting and analysis of marketing campaigns and promotions through the integration of customer data sources and the ability to parse the data through a broad range of analytic searches. Using this type of marketing campaign reporting allows organizations to evaluate and optimize multiple campaigns for different business sectors based on real-world analysis of their effectiveness. Campaign Management software is related to Email Marketing software, Marketing Automation software and Search Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Channel Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Channel Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Channel Management software allows companies to streamline their distribution and sales efforts by organizing clients into specific segments and keeping track of marketing outreach and buying patterns. Specific types of Channel Management software focuses on partner programs. Channel Management software is related to Marketing Automation software, eCommerce software and Lead Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Marketing software automates the processes of creating, publishing, and tracking the ROI of content-related marketing campaigns. Common functionality of these solutions includes workflow management, collaborative editing, scheduled publishing, SEO analytics, and social integration.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Relationship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Relationship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software enables customer interaction, support and relationship management. The purpose of a CRM application is to enable organizations to better manage their customers through the introduction of reliable systems, processes and procedures. Customer Relationship Management software integrates organizational processes across marketing, sales and customer services. CRM software is related to Contract Management software and Online CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Digital Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Digital Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Digital Asset Management software automates the management of images and other non-textual materials. Digital Asset Management applications enable powerful, flexible solutions for developing, organizing, and distributing digital assets across multiple office locations and business sectors. These solutions ensure optimal usage for an organization's rich media assets such as advertising pieces, product images, sales collateral, audio, and video files. Digital Asset Management software is related to Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Direct Mail Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Direct Mail Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Direct Mail Automation software and related services streamline creation, production, distribution and tracking of marketing campaigns that center around delivering printed materials (such as postcards of brochures) or other physical objects to the target audience.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Email Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Email Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Email Marketing software enables the automation of email communication with prospects and customers. Organizations use Email Marketing software to increase the efficiency of their email marketing efforts, manage mailing lists and monitor the effectiveness of their marketing campaigns. Email Marketing applications can also aid in the regular production of customer-oriented newsletters, the management of email templates for multiple campaigns or market segments, and ongoing customer relationship management efforts. Email Marketing software is related to Campaign Management software and Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Generation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Generation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Generation software helps sales personnel identify prospective customers.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Push Notifications software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Push Notifications tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Push Notifications software helps companies deliver personalized messages to their website visitors in real time via pop-up notifications. Additionally, Push Notifications software can serve as a centralized repository for messages from various services.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Web Analytics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Web Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Web Analytics Software enables organizations to track and analyze information regarding their website visitors including who they are, how they found the site, what path they take through the site and the actions they take while there. Using these measurements can help organizations gauge the effectiveness of their marketing and advertising efforts as well as how effectively their website operates as a sales tool. Web Analytic applications can also assist with the process of advertising on the web by evaluating the popularity and effectiveness of keyword search terms. Web Analytics software is related to Campaign Management software and Marketing Automation software.

category_features.name: Lead Distribution
category_features.definition: Manually or automatically assign leads to sales reps

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: Multiple Scoring Models
category_features.definition: Create multiple models or equations for generating scores

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: Prioritization
category_features.definition: Arrange activities and tasks based on their relative importance

category_features.name: Process/Workflow Automation
category_features.definition: Design workflow paths once and apply the logic to enable automatic creation of future processes and workflows

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Commission Management
category_features.definition: Track employee commission potential and earnings

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Customer Database
category_features.definition: Searchable repository of information about clients

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Lead Management
category_features.definition: Store information about leads and contacts and track them through the sales process

category_features.name: Performance Metrics
category_features.definition: A set of indicators that tracks how well an organization, a division, or a particular project are performing

category_features.name: Referral Tracking
category_features.definition: Log and store the source of contacts/leads

category_features.name: Territory Management
category_features.definition: Organize customer data and accounts by user or geography

category_features.name: Automated Publishing
category_features.definition: Establish rules for automatic propagation of social media posts across one or more channels

category_features.name: Brand Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor social media posts that mention a particular brand

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Content Management
category_features.definition: Creating, updating, monitoring accuracy, and ensuring brand consistency for all written materials that are distributed to stakeholders.

category_features.name: Customer Engagement
category_features.definition: Initiate interactions with customers by proactively starting conversations or providing informational content

category_features.name: Multi-Account Management
category_features.definition: Manage and post content across multiple social media accounts and platforms simultaneously

category_features.name: Post Scheduling
category_features.definition: Assign a specific time to when pre-written content appears on social media sites

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Social Media Monitoring
category_features.definition: Track activity on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

category_features.definition: Establish rules for automatic propagation of social media posts across one or more channels

related_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
related_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.  You also get access to 150,000+ sales organizations and a 2 million user-strong community that are passionate about sales growth.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with a 360? customer relationship lifecycle management solution built on an omnichannel platform.
related_products.features: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with a 360? customer relationship lifecycle management solution. Key features include contact management, sales funnels, pipeline management, workflow automation, AI-powered conversational assistant, task management, managing marketing campaigns, sales forecasting, customer support & service, inventory management, reporting & analytics, and seamlessly integrate with 500+ popular business apps in a single business system.

related_products.short_desc: HubSpot CRM has everything you need to organize, track, and build better relationships with leads and customers.
related_products.features: Whether you've got a small team of five or a sophisticated sales force of 500, HubSpot offers pricing and packaging options that grow with you. HubSpot customer relationship management (CRM) software is built for companies that want to spend less time logging data. It keeps all your contacts in one centralized, customizable database. And you can see everything about a lead in one place -- no more digging through inboxes to find information. Start using the free HubSpot CRM today.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is an easy to implement CRM software tool that helps you focus on the activities that drive deals to close.
related_products.features: Pipedrive is a sales-focused customer relationship management tool that teams of all sizes love using. With 100'000+ paying customers spanning across 179 countries, sales teams are drawn in by our CRMs simple yet powerful design that prioritizes usability above all else. When using Pipedrive, nothing falls through the cracks, allowing your team to spend less time filing and more time selling with a CRM software that is both agile and powerful.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you -- everywhere you work.
related_products.features: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you by automatically combining your contacts, communication histories, email inboxes, and calendar appointments with over 250+ SaaS business app contacts and social media connections (including Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook) into one unified team relationship manager.

related_products.short_desc: ActiveCampaign CRM helps you sell more in less time by combining automated lead prioritization, task creation, and contact management.
related_products.features: ActiveCampaign's CRM combines contact organization with sales automation, helping you sell more in less time. Prioritize your leads, keep track of your tasks, and automate contact management so nothing falls through the cracks. See your whole sales process at a glance and track every interaction, keeping your team on the same page. Features like lead scoring, win probability, and automated segmentation combined with marketing automation turns your team into a well-oiled, deal-closing machine.

related_products.short_desc:
The smarter way for small businesses to do great work
Keap organizes your client information & daily work in one place, freeing you up
related_products.features: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.

related_products.short_desc: Run your business your way with a fully integrated CRM for small to medium sized businesses.
related_products.features: Stay organized as you scale and grow. Finally, a CRM that?s easy to use, fully customizable and puts you in control of how you manage your leads, customers, tasks, team, projects, marketing and more. Create your free account to start customizing your CRM today.

CRM+ seamlessly integrates your customer-focused activities with accounting, e-commerce, warehousing and shipping applications to support your entire sales process and customer life cycle starting from a lead, and progressing through opportunity, sales order, fulfillment, renewal, upsell, cross-sell and support.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve your team's accountability and productivity with flexible CRM that matches your sales process exactly.
similar_products.features: Improve your team's accountability and productivity with a flexible CRM that matches your complex sales process exactly. Track tasks, leads, and opportunities in real time. similar_products.short_desc: TigerLRM is an all-in-one Sales Enablement Software with tools for Content Management, Training & Coaching, In-Built CRM, and more.

similar_products.short_desc:

similar_products.short_desc: monday sales CRM empowers sales teams to manage every aspect of their sales cycle and customer data in one centralized place.

Dubbed the CRM without the frustration, it handles all sales processes and client communication in one place. From capturing leads, managing contact info, tracking deals or collaborating across departments, monday sales CRM lets you manage it all. You can use built-in automations or easily create your own to streamline any manual work so you can focus more time on sales.

With VipeCloud's single solution + rapport building, your business will increase efficiency and accelerate growth. It's no surprise 99% of customers rate our support at 4+ stars.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Management software provides powerful tools that enable storage, tracking, and management of contact information throughout an organization. Contact Management applications allow organizations to function more effectively by distributing current contact information for customers, contractors, vendors and others to all levels and locations of an organization. Contact Management solutions also often incorporate efficiency-increasing features such as lead management tools, employee task logs and customer interaction histories. Contact Management software is related to Campaign Management software, Lead Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Tracking software enables businesses and sales teams to monitor pipelines, manage steps in the sales process, and track key performance numbers.
